4751.verse: ٱصْلَوْهَا|Burn in it|96|106|14529$فَٱصْبِرُوٓاْ|then be patient|123|143|6595$أَوْ|or|41|61|154$لَا|(do) not|75|95|30$تَصْبِرُواْ|be patient,|100|120|3223$سَوَآءٌ|(it is) same|95|115|60$عَلَيْكُمْ‌ۖ|for you.|76|86|416$إِنَّمَا|Only|55|71|102$تُجْزَوْنَ|you are being recompensed|202|234|5841$مَا|(for) what|88|120|262$كُنتُمْ|you used (to)|111|143|214$تَعْمَلُونَ|do.`|92|108|725$

4753.verse: فَـٰكِهِينَ|Enjoying|87|100|15595$بِمَآ|in what|69|94|43$ءَاتَـٰهُمْ|has given them|121|146|7765$رَبُّهُمْ|their Lord,|88|113|3627$وَوَقَـٰهُمْ|and protected them|152|177|15627$رَبُّهُمْ|their Lord|83|96|3627$عَذَابَ|(from the) punishment|168|372|1786$ٱلْجَحِيمِ|(of) Hellfire.|99|303|1107$

4755.verse: مُتَّكِــِٔينَ|Reclining|86|99|10747$عَلَىٰ|on|63|89|52$سُرُرٍ|thrones|70|96|9787$مَّصْفُوفَةٍ‌ۖ|lined up,|103|129|16192$وَزَوَّجْنَـٰهُم|and We will marry them|175|201|15622$بِحُورٍ|to fair ones|96|109|16193$عِينٍ|with large eyes.|126|126|16194$

4756.verse: وَٱلَّذِينَ|And those who|119|129|42$ءَامَنُواْ|believed|82|101|84$وَٱتَّبَعَتْهُمْ|and followed them|141|160|16195$ذُرِّيَّتُهُم|their offspring|112|131|16196$بِإِيمَـٰنٍ|in faith,|80|99|16197$أَلْحَقْنَا|We will join|94|104|16198$بِهِمْ|with them|86|93|125$ذُرِّيَّتَهُمْ|their offspring|112|126|6988$وَمَآ|and not|71|85|46$أَلَتْنَـٰهُم|We will deprive them|157|171|16199$مِّنْ|of|50|64|53$عَمَلِهِم|their deeds|94|108|16200$مِّن|(in) any|72|79|53$شَىْءٍ‌ۚ|thing.|69|90|186$كُلُّ|Every|57|99|575$ٱمْرِىِٕۭ|person|76|118|12437$بِمَا|for what|76|118|43$كَسَبَ|he earned|86|128|773$رَهِينٌ|(is) pledged.|103|124|16201$

4757.verse: وَأَمْدَدْنَـٰهُم|And We will provide them|187|204|16202$بِفَـٰكِهَةٍ|with fruit|81|116|14871$وَلَحْمٍ|and meat|82|117|16203$مِّمَّا|from what|87|122|216$يَشْتَهُونَ|they desire.|99|116|9997$

4758.verse: يَتَنَـٰزَعُونَ|They will pass to one another|217|228|10685$فِيهَا|therein|66|88|253$كَأْسًا|a cup,|64|86|16204$لَّا|no|36|58|30$لَغْوٌ|ill speech|81|103|16205$فِيهَا|therein|66|88|253$وَلَا|and no|65|76|25$تَأْثِيمٌ|sin.|62|62|16206$

4759.verse: ۞ وَيَطُوفُ|And will circulate|144|156|16207$عَلَيْهِمْ|among them|101|126|22$غِلْمَانٌ|boys|81|106|16208$لَّهُمْ|for them,|81|106|98$كَأَنَّهُمْ|as if they (were)|132|157|944$لُؤْلُؤٌ|pearls|62|74|16209$مَّكْنُونٌ|well-protected.|122|122|14623$

4762.verse: فَمَنَّ ٱللَّهُ|But Allah conferred favor|185|212|4340$عَلَيْنَا|upon us,|77|131|681$وَوَقَـٰنَا|and protected us|134|188|16211$عَذَابَ|(from the) punishment|168|195|1786$ٱلسَّمُومِ|(of) the Scorching Fire.|176|176|9757$

4764.verse: فَذَكِّرْ|Therefore remind,|137|146|16103$فَمَآ|for not|65|82|132$أَنتَ|you|58|75|341$بِنِعْمَتِ|(are) by (the) grace|155|172|13849$رَبِّكَ|(of) your Lord|112|129|1322$بِكَاهِنٍ|a soothsayer,|111|120|16214$وَلَا|and not|71|327|25$مَجْنُونٍ|a madman.|92|348|14606$

4750.verse: Then is this magic, or do you not see?

4751.verse: [Enter to] burn therein; then be patient or impatient - it is all the same for you. You are only being recompensed [for] what you used to do."

4752.verse: Indeed, the righteous will be in gardens and pleasure,

4753.verse: Enjoying what their Lord has given them, and their Lord protected them from the punishment of Hellfire.

4754.verse: [They will be told], "Eat and drink in satisfaction for what you used to do."

4755.verse: They will be reclining on thrones lined up, and We will marry them to fair women with large, [beautiful] eyes.

4756.verse: And those who believed and whose descendants followed them in faith - We will join with them their descendants, and We will not deprive them of anything of their deeds. Every person, for what he earned, is retained.

4757.verse: And We will provide them with fruit and meat from whatever they desire.

4758.verse: They will exchange with one another a cup [of wine] wherein [results] no ill speech or commission of sin.

4759.verse: There will circulate among them [servant] boys [especially] for them, as if they were pearls well-protected.

4760.verse: And they will approach one another, inquiring of each other.

4761.verse: They will say, "Indeed, we were previously among our people fearful [of displeasing Allah].

4762.verse: So Allah conferred favor upon us and protected us from the punishment of the Scorching Fire.

4763.verse: Indeed, we used to supplicate Him before. Indeed, it is He who is the Beneficent, the Merciful."

4764.verse: So remind [O Muhammad], for you are not, by the favor of your Lord, a soothsayer or a madman.

4765.verse: Or do they say [of you], "A poet for whom we await a misfortune of time?"

4766.verse: Say, "Wait, for indeed I am, with you, among the waiters."
